httpport.name: HTTP Port
httpport.description: Port for incoming http requests, if used.

httpsport.name: HTTPS Port
httpsport.description: Port for incoming https requests, if used. Make sure SSL options have been configured.

sslcert.name: Path to SSL/TLS certificate
sslcert.description: Defaults to self-signed certificate. Must be a single, full-chain file. Consider copying a real certificate from the host into the jail and keeping it updated regularly.

sslkey.name: Path to SSL/TLS key
sslkey.description: Defaults to autogenerated at install time. Consider copying a key matching a real certificate from the host into the jail.

adminprotocol.name: Admin UI Protocol
adminprotocol.description: Protocol for accessing admin UI. Defaults to HTTPS using self-signed certificate or if configured in the other settings.

adminport.name: Admin UI Port
adminport.description: Default port for accessing admin UI. Defaults to 443 if SSSL configured, or determined from the other settings.
